PowerUp

      Subclasses of PowerUp in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExtraGuess
      ExtraGuess objects represent a type of poer-up the player could obtain in the game.
      class  IncreaseRoll
      Instances of IncreaseRoll represent a type of power-up in the game.
      class  MindReader
      MindReader instances represent a specific power-up type (Mindreader) in the game.
      class  TieBreaker
      TieBreaker instances represent a specific power-up type (Tiebreaker) in the game.
      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as PowerUp 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PowerUp[] GameEnvironment.ALL_POWER_UPS
      An array of instances of all the PowerUp subclasses.
      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type PowerUp 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<PowerUp> Hero.appliedPowerUps
      A list of the power-ups which are currently applied to the hero, initialised empty.
      private java.util.ArrayList<PowerUp> Team.powerUpsOwned
      An ArrayList of power-ups currently owned and not applied, initialised to empty.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return PowerUp 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PowerUp Team.popPowerUpFromList(PowerUpType powerUpType)
      Takes a PowerUpType, and returns a PowerUp object of that type from the team's list of owned powerUps, removing it from the list.

      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type PowerUp 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Hero.addPowerUp(PowerUp powerUp)
      Adds the given power-up to the hero's list of active power-ups
      private void ShopPanel.addPowerUpPanel(PowerUp powerUp)
      Creates a information panel for the given power up, and adds it to the contentPanelCardLayout, using the String representation of the power up.
      void Team.buyPowerUp(PowerUp powerUp)
      Takes a new powerUp object and buys it if the team has enough money.
